. @ fhollande "On all continents, soldiers have given their lives for France to honor its responsibilities"
@ fhollande "I will never forget these moments, the mourning but also the dignity of the families"
"I want to have a thought for the memory of Sergeant Barbé, an example in every respect" @fhollande
"What our soldiers do in OPEX deserves all our respect, which is why I wanted to build a place of remembrance" @fhollande
"Here will be a memorial next year to the soldiers killed for France in OPEX" @fhollande
"In recent years, France has had to intervene several times alone or with its allies beyond its borders" @fhollande
. @ fhollande "In Lebanon, 39 years after the launch of UNIFIL, we are still present and perpetuate historical ties"
. @ fhollande "In Asia, there was the exit of a situation of civil war in Cambodia, we were there."
. @ fhollande "More than 70,000 soldiers from our armies took part in the conflict in Afghanistan"
@ fhollande "At the end of 2012, we withdrew our forces, we had 88 casualties in Afghanistan"
"Then I decided to engage our forces in early 2013 in Mali and then in Central Africa, Iraq and Syria" @fhollande
"12,000 soldiers are currently deployed outside our borders, all with a mission" @fhollande
"To compete for peace and to be at the rendezvous of our responsibilities, that's why we are hiring soldiers abroad" @fhollande
"France would not be France if it did not oppose dictators, if it did not help the victims of terrorism"
. @ fhollande "Fighting terrorism abroad means allowing us to fight on the inside"
"I want to salute our security forces, our intelligence services, as well as Operation Sentinel, which offers an indispensable assistance"
"I want to salute the courage, the self-sacrifice and the professionalism of our soldiers" @fhollande
"I had asked to review the criteria for awarding the fighters card" @fhollande
"This recognition, we owe it to the military families, we must surround them and accompany them" @fhollande
@ fhollande "I wanted this memorial for the 4th generation of fire."
. @ fhollande "This memorial will be placed at a place called in tribute to the Sub-Lieutenant Eugénie-Malika DJENDI"
"I wanted this monument to be in an accessible and open place The name of all the dead soldiers in OPEX will be registered" @fhollande
"I hear some words judging that one intervenes outside to be influenced or to dominate" @fhollande
"We intervene to ensure peace, protect the people" @fhollande
